text: Mechatronics (or mechatronic engineering) is a combination of mechanical engineering, electronic engineering, computer engineering, control engineering, and systems-design engineering in order to design and manufacture some useful products. Mechatronics is an engineering system design that combines several areas of study and avoids splitting engineering into separate disciplines.Mechatronics: The Science of Intelligent Machines ==Related pages== *Cybernetics *Mechanical engineering *Computer engineering *Control engineering *Electronic engineering *Systems engineering ==Notes== Category:Engineering disciplines
title: Mechatronics engineering
